summary: The Cayman Islands are a British territory in the Caribbean Sea, made up of three islands: Grand Cayman, Cayman Brac, and Little Cayman. They are known for their beautiful beaches and as a popular place for international businesses and wealthy people to manage their money because there are no income taxes. The capital, George Town, is on Grand Cayman, the biggest and most populated island. With a high GDP per capita, the Cayman Islands has one of the highest standards of living globally, attracting immigrants from many countries.
title: Cayman Islands
